version_description:
• Much better math answers and explanations
• Cleaner design
• Better camera

-New rankings, best answers come first
-Easier to take and read photos
-More math solutions

-Faster camera
-Improved math results

Amazing math features, including:
-Color-coded steps to help you solve math problems
-Math Explainer cards to help you learn and understand
-Graph card for all math equations

• Small fix to guide new users to our example questions
• Hi new students!! Try us on a few questions to get the hang of it!
• Performance improvements
- Performance improvements

-Socratic goes global! Now available in English, Spanish, French, German, Indonesian, and Portuguese
-Socratic goes bigger! Now available on iPad
-Socratic gets more accessible! Now available with DynamicType, increased font size for low-vision users

-Socratic goes global! Now available in English, Spanish, French, German, Indonesian, and Portuguese
-Socratic goes bigger! Now available on iPad
-Socratic gets more accessible! Now available with DynamicType, increased font size for low-vision users
It's faster, it's better - you're gonna love it!
It's faster, it's better - you're gonna love it!
Small improvements that will make your Socratic experience INCREDIBLE!

Cropping just got a little bit easier. You’ll notice that when you scan a homework question, it’s easier to adjust the cropping area to make sure your *whole* question will get scanned. Boom!

Swipe below the camera button to access the keyboard or type with math symbols.

And the real magic: pull down anywhere on your screen to invite your classmates! Share the Socratic love by sending the app to your squad over Messages, Facebook Messenger, or pasting the link anywhere you please. Or have your peeps open Snapchat and scan our Snapcode for lightning-fast sharing. Holla!

Get ready to ace those math tests. A fresh new look for Socratic’s math card makes navigating solutions easier than ever! Plus, this release includes support for new math concepts like factoring quadratics, systems of equations, derivatives, and more. You’ll also notice that the math card offers hints throughout the solution—helpful explanations or a deeper understanding are just a tap away. Yup, you need this.

Visual learner? This version's math card includes *illustrated* hints between steps (!) as well as light bulbs that will get you unstuck even faster. Plus, we've sprinkled in a few treasures to help you discover new features you may not have seen yet. Intrigue!

We've made a few low-key (but major key) improvements in this update!

Loving the app? Leave us a review!

Questions?! Shoot us an email at hello@socratic.org.

Study Groups are HERE! The best way to get instant help on your homework from friends and classmates. You heard it here first—so drop everything and update, y’all!

It’s like a group chat, but better: see who’s online, share class notes, and get your homework done *together* without even switching apps. And if you don’t know many people in class, now you have a chill place to ask for help!

Highlights:
- Create Study Groups for your toughest classes (or like, all of them)
- Invite classmates via Messenger, Kik, or wherever they are
- Ask questions, share notes, and get help from each other when you need it

Now get after it and make those Study Groups, people. You’re welcome.

Create Study Groups for your toughest classes! Invite your classmates for hw help, sharing notes, and studying for all those tests!

Loving the app? Leave us a review!
Questions?! Shoot us an email at hello@socratic.org.

Trick… or TREAT?! We’ve treated y’all to some sweet improvements!

Loving the app? Leave us a review!

Questions?! Shoot us an email at hello@socratic.org.

Good things come in threes:

1. Swipe over to the right to discover Study Groups at your school
2. Zoom in on pics in chat (for y'all who were panicking)
3. See when anyone from a Study Group is online

Loving the app? Leave us a review!

Questions?! Shoot us an email at hello@socratic.org.

iPhone X peeps: we've got your back. This release brings iPhone X support for homework do-ers everywhere!

For the rest of y'all, good things still come in threes:

1. Swipe over to the right to discover Study Groups at your school
2. Zoom in on pics in chat (for y'all who were panicking)
3. See when anyone from a Study Group is online

Loving the app? Leave us a review!
Questions?! Shoot us an email at hello@socratic.org.

After a hiatus, we’re back—and the best parts of the app are as fresh as ever!

Take a photo to get instant explanations to your toughest homework questions.

Big change: the app **no longer offers chat or study groups.** We’ve sunsetted these features to focus on what the app does best: helping you find answers and understand your homework problems. Questions? Shoot us a note at hello@socratic.org.

Onward!
Teensy tiny updates to make the app all-around better. Ta-da!
Teensy tiny updates to make the app all-around better. Ta-da!

Socratic is now part of Google! The new app has more subjects and better help. #bettertogether
Socratic is now part of Google! The new app has more subjects and better help. #bettertogether
This release brings a few fresh fixes and new Explainers for Calculus! Check ‘em out in the Explorer by swiping up from the home screen.
Socratic has flash! No need to struggle through studying in the dark. Just tap the "Flash" icon to illuminate your work and get. that. help. Huzzah!
You can now access your gallery photos! Tap the “Picture” icon at the top to use images from your phone.
You now have access to step-by-step walkthroughs for algebra! Take a picture of an equation and tap the “Top Match” card to see detailed explanations.
Teensy tiny updates to make the app all-around better. Ta-da!
